data.title: Live at The Blue Lamp presents SCuba - Jazz / World Music Quintet
data.meta_description: Scubaâ€™s percussion-driven sound takes the audience on an exciting musical world tour. With influences from Cuba to Norway and New York to the Middle East, their music is full of surprises.
data.text:
Following on from their sell out show during the Aberdeen Jazz Festival 2024 we had to get the guys back for another performance!

Scubaâ€™s percussion-driven sound takes the audience on an exciting musical world tour. With influences from Cuba to Norway and New York to the Middle East, their music is full of surprises. Expect the music of Eddie Palmieri, Michel Camilo and Keith Jarrett amongst others, all delivered in Scubaâ€™s trademark adventurous style. Described as â€˜a fiesta of pulsating, rhythmically tight Latino/Cuban jazzâ€™, Scuba create compelling performances that have thrilled festival audiences across Scotland.

ðŸŽµ Paul Greenwood (saxophone), Ricky Linn (percussion), Richard Bailey (piano), Seth Bennett (bass), Paul Judge (drums)

Doors open 7:30pm

Show starts 8:15pm

14+ allowed to attend when accompanied with an adult

Loyalty Programme - This scheme requires you to first sign-up, where you will receive points right away. Once you have signed up you will then be able to start earning points from the purchasing of tickets. Once you have earned enough points you will be able to exchange them for a discount reward. You can find out more about the scheme on our website.

https://www.thebluelampaberdeen.com/loyalty

Gift cards - now available for purchase on our website, and these can be bought for yourself or for someone else. The value of these cards can range from Â£10 up to Â£500 and are only redeemable on â€˜Live at The Blue Lampâ€™ shows or any item from our shop.
